sections.heading: Violations; administrative fine
sections.text: The commission may administratively fine pursuant to section 75-156 any person who violates the Automatic Dialing-Announcing Devices Act or the rules and regulations adopted and promulgated under the act.SourceLaws 1993, LB 305, ยง 22;Laws 2000, LB 1285, ยง 21;R.S.Supp.
